message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL

The paper deals with the problem of catastrophic forgetting in deep neural networks, which is a common issue in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The proposed method involves a framework for continual learning with DNNs, which is a topic that falls under the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), neural networks (cs.NE), and natural language processing (cs.CL). However, since the paper focuses on deep learning and neural networks, cs.LG and cs.NE are the most likely sub-categories, followed by cs.AI and cs.CV. The paper does not explicitly deal with natural language processing, so cs.CL is the least likely sub-category.
